name: @proofkit/fmodata-mcp
description: MCP server for FileMaker OData API
author: Eric <37158449+eluce2@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.build: tsc && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); if (fs.existsSync('dist/fmodata-mcp/src')) { const src = 'dist/fmodata-mcp/src'; const dest = 'dist'; fs.cpSync(src, dest, { recursive: true }); fs.rmSync('dist/fmodata-mcp', { recursive: true }); }" && publint --strict
scripts.ci: pnpm build && pnpm check-format && pnpm publint --strict
scripts.pub:beta: pnpm build && npm publish --tag beta --access public
scripts.pub:next: pnpm build && npm publish --tag next --access public
